room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape the Room STL in St. Louis
review: The escape room was so much fun! We did the clock tower room and it was challenging, but we had a blast. Alexis was an awesome host and helped us move along when we got stuck.

room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape the Room STL in St. Louis
review: We had 5 teens and a 7 year old with 3 adults. We had a great time, and the game master was very nice , even when we felt clueless, he was very helpful! The clock tower is very difficult!

room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape the Room STL in St. Louis
review: We escaped the Clock Tower! Ashley was the best clue master. Challenging course for our first escape, but we made it out.
